General.Name: Jakpaisan Estate Public Company Limited
General.Description: Jakpaisan Estate Public Company Limited engages in the real estate development business in Thailand. It operates through Real Estate Development, Construction Services, and Other segments. The company develops and sells single houses, commercial buildings, townhouses, condominiums, and twin houses. It also engages in sale of beverages and bakery products under franchise agreements; and rental of investment properties. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand.
